attributes.action: add the option of "None of the above" to local and general election ballot papers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about time that the British public had the right to protest at the ballot box.  This option would be a legitimate way to show our disregard at all political parties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
